Ci sono stato per una visita di lavoro a Lund. Il posto è accogliente, il personale abbastanza cortese, le camere non male l'unica pecca sono i servizi. Per il resto un albergo discreto, senza grandi pretese, al centro di Lund e vicino l'Università. Ci tornerei volentieri.

This hotel has an excellent location in a walking district. It has a good parking possibility on the opposite side of the street. The breakfast was served to our room an was quite acceptable. Our prolem was that there was no one to receive us at arrival (4 pm), although the…

column5: Jeg tog med en veninde til Lund og jeg må sige vi blev overrasket på den positive måde. Dette hotel er noget for sig; hyggeligt, værelser er søde, små og i intime og så fik man morgenmad på sengen. Sengene kan være lidt smalle, men er dejlig bløde. Hotellet ligger centralt tæt…

We stayed in Apartment 8, which is oddly located in the back of the hotel. There's no on-site staff, so you have to ring the call button, talk to the staff and have someone come from another property. The room was worth the wait. The kitchen was small but reasonably well…

Coming from a glitzy hotel in Malmo, the Ahlstrom was quite a difference experience. I don't want to sound like I am being negative because there isn't much to fault in Ahlstrom's service and intent.  Located right in the historic part of Lund it is an easy walk to the station…

column4: Inexpensive, large rooms in the middle of Lund
column5: This hotel was good for its price. It was right in the centre of Lund (walking distance from the railway station). We had a room without a bathroom, but the bathroom was next door to the room and we never had to wait for it so that was fine. The room was spacious, clean, and…

In the center of Lund. The staff are great (the best service and enthusiasm I ever experienced). Breakfast on the room (you choose the time you want) free wifi, tv and so on...  Lost my keycard..Got an sms from the hotel, they gave me a code to the hotel entrance door, and then…
很温馨的小旅店，就在城中心的广场旁边，从南大街转过去一点点就到了。单人房间不大，但是基本东西都有，可以上网。布置得整洁雅致，一夜安眠。早餐丰富味美。态度也很好。

The hotel is a ten minute walk from the train station and a 3 minute walk from the cathedral. The room we stayed in had a mini sofa and was very comfortable. The breakfast is simple but you can have it anytime you want. The staff and very helpful and friendly.

column4: Cosy hotel with great breakfast in the center of Lund
